casebody.data:
LLOYD SABAUDO SOCIETA ANONIMA PER AZIONI, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Philip ELTING, Collector, etc., Defendant-Appellant. No. 43. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Oct. 16, 1936. Lamar Hardy, U. S. Atty., of New York City (George B. Schoonmaker, Sp. Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for appellant. Kirlin, Campbell, Hickox, Keating & McGrann and Gaspare M. Cusumano, all of New York City (Delbert M. Tibbetts, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open court.
